page.title: 18Interview with the Mayor
page.content: We interviewed Councillor Johnson who is the new Mayor of Cambridge.He has lived in Cherry Hinton for nearly 21 years.He says that the village of Cherry Hinton was much smaller and more compact when he moved in and he liked it like that.Since he moved in there has been a lot of building of houses,shops and factories.Cherry Hinton is much noisier now than it used to be and he would like less traffic in the village.He likes Cherry Hinton a lot.He lives in a bungalow which was built in 1964.The bungalow is set well back from the road so he does not hear very much of the noise.
